page.title: 05Trade
page.content: Farming is the major industry in this district ({see page 1}). {Ghyll manor}is a{hotel and restaurant with 28 staff most of whom live on the premises.The menu is varied but expensive,and it is popular particularly at the weekends. It offers a good service for larger functions and gains custom from being near to Gatwick Airport. All the four{ {Public Houses,"The Plough"and"The {Star"}in Rusper village,{"The Lamb"}in Lambs Green and{"The Gate"} serve meals and attract custom from a wide area.{Rusper Hire}deals in plant for the building trade.{The Coach Works}is a vehicle body repair work shop. In Rusper there is a{general store combined with a post office and also a smallscale pottery and{antique}dealer.
